channel.title: 3 problems i need solving
channel.description:
Problem 1)
I have bluurrs client, just want to fix skulls if anyone can please help it would be most appreciated.
Problem 2)
I want to remove ancient quest needed for delta source.
Problem 3)
Also need help on how to remove the quest requirement for piety (knights legend) delta source
if you can help with any of these please add no_way_0ut@live.com

item.title: 3 problems i need solving
item.dc:creator: @FireClan FireClan
item.description:
@FireClan wrote:

i can solve problem 2 for you

instead of removing add this command

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("noquests")) { q1=15; sendQuest("@gre@Lost City", 7332); q2=15; sendQuest("@gre@Rune Mysteries", 7333); q3=15; q4=15; q5=15; q6=15; sendQuest("@gre@Sheep Shearer ", 7339); q7=15; q8=15; sendQuest("@gre@Lunar Diplomacy", 7340); q10=15; q11=15; sendQuest("@gre@The Wolf's Cure", 7342); sM("You have now compleet all the quests"); sM("Relog to make it compleet!"); }

now add this sendmessage if you want you donâ€™t need to tough

sM("Type ::noquests if you hate quests!
